Token.Abstract: The RKRouteSet class provides for the storage and retrieval of RKRoute objects. Route objects are added and removed the route set to manipulate the routing table of the application.
Adds a route to the receiver.

Parameter.Name: route
Parameter.Abstract: The route to be added. @raises NSInvalidArgumentException Raised if the route already exists in the receiver or overlaps an existing name.

Token.Abstract: Removes a route from the receiver.

Parameter.Name: route
Parameter.Abstract: The route to be removed. @raises NSInvalidArgumentException Raised if the route does not exist in the receiver.

Token.Abstract: Determines if a given route exists within the receiver.

Parameter.Name: route
Parameter.Abstract: The route to be tested for containement.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the route is contained within the route set, else NO.

Token.Abstract: Returns all routes from the receiver in an array.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array containing all the routes in the receiver.

Token.Abstract: Returns all named routes from the receiver in an array.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array containing all the named routes in the receiver.

Token.Abstract: Returns all class routes from the receiver in an array.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array containing all the class routes in the receiver.

Token.Abstract: Returns all relationship routes from the receiver in an array.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array containing all the relationship routes in the receiver.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves a route with the given name.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the named route to be found.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A route with the given name or nil if none was found.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves a route for the given object class and request method.

Parameter.Name: objectClass
Parameter.Abstract: The object class of the route to be retrieved.

Parameter.Name: method
Parameter.Abstract: The request method of the route to be retrieved.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A route with the given object class and method or nil if none was found.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves a route for a given relationship of a class with a given request method.

Parameter.Name: relationship
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the relationship of the route to be retrieved.

Parameter.Name: method
Parameter.Abstract: The request method of the route to be retrieved.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A route with the given relationship name, object class and method or nil if none was found.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all class routes with a given object class.

Parameter.Name: objectClass
Parameter.Abstract: The object class of the routes to be retrieved.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array containing all class routes with the given class.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all object routes for a given object.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: An object for which all object routes are to be retrieved.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array containing all object routes where the target class is included in the given object's class hierarchy.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all routes for a given relationship name and object class.

Parameter.Name: relationshipName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the relationship of the routes to be retrieved.

Parameter.Name: objectClass
Parameter.Abstract: The object class of the routes to be retrieved.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array containing all relationship routes with the given relationship name and object class.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves a route for a given object and request method.
